function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Emerging environmental concerns such as climate change and pollution may lead to an increased risk of contagious diseases in buildings.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and compromised occupant health.","Mitigation":"Implementing sustainable and eco-friendly building practices, improving ventilation systems, and maintaining high standards of indoor air quality.","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, sensors for monitoring indoor air quality, and green building materials.","People":"Building occupants, especially those with pre-existing health conditions, are at risk.","Owner":"Building designers, architects, and construction companies can implement the mitigation measures."},{"Description":"Global epidemics of stress and longer working hours may impact occupant mental and social well-being in buildings.","Impact":"Increased mental health issues and reduced social well-being among building occupants.","Mitigation":"Providing mental health support services, creating communal spaces for social interaction, and promoting work-life balance.","Technologies":"Smart building management systems, wellness apps for mental health, and collaborative workspaces.","People":"Occupants of buildings, especially those in high-stress occupations, are at risk.","Owner":"Employers, building managers, and mental health professionals can implement the mitigation measures."}]}
